p.s: A Git repository-only list plugin generator for both PEAR_PackageFileManager, and PEAR_PackageFileManager2 classes.
p.d: It will only include files that are part of the git index-- that is, files in the current branch plus files staged for commit. It simply uses `git ls-files` to get a list of files to package. If you just want files excluded that are in .gitignore or .git/info/exclude, see https://github.com/armen/PEAR_PackageFileManager_Git
